summary: Implements backend book catalog, frontend routing (landing + reader), themed styling, catalog fetching, and an in-browser PDF reader with download. However, the required static PDF and generated image assets are only referenced, not added in the diff, and Internet Identity/auth plumbing appears added despite being a non-goal.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the Honeydew ebook file as a static frontend asset under frontend/public and wire it to the ebook catalog entry, with a placeholder + one obvious swap step if needed.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend/catalog points to "/assets/Honeydew.pdf" and a replacement comment references "frontend/public/assets/Honeydew.pdf", but no PDF file is included in the diff summary, so the stable browser-accessible asset cannot be confirmed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and include the logo and hero illustration under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI as static assets (not via backend).
missing_requirements.reason: UI references the required image paths under "/assets/generated/...", but the actual image files are not present in the diff summary under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication/login infrastructure (provider, auth client, identity-based actor logic).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists user accounts/logins/Internet Identity sign-in flows as non-goals, but the diff adds InternetIdentityProvider and related hooks and logic.
Not requested by the BuildRequest requirements or acceptance criteria.
